channel.title: HELP please, i need to make a safe zone, but only in a certain area
channel.description:
ok i need to make a safe zone in a pk place, for a bank and ancient altar, the area looks like this-
...................................................... Ok, so the \ / is where the bank and altar is. i want to make that the safe zone, the open space is w. . \ / . But how can i make the bank area safe zone withouth messing up the wild zone??? if you can help plz . . post and all thanks :) I also checked for safe zone and all found em and all but i cant figure out how . . to make them smaller. :S . . ( or in a certain area...) . . . . . . . . . . . . ......................................................
